title: Luxury room rates hit the roof ahead of Anant Ambani's wedding
description: Anant Ambaniâ€™s wedding at Jio World Convention Centre spikes Mumbai luxury hotels' demand from July 11-17. Rates hit Rs 5 lakh at Four Seasons. Trident BKC, Sofitel BKC, Holiday Inn, ITC Grand Central, The Oberoi, Taj, JW Marriott, and Leela see price hikes and dynamic pricing. Traffic restrictions from Mumbai Traffic Police. Rate stabilization expected post-July 20.
